Customer Payment Follow-up Management

This module is help to automate letters for unpaid invoices, with multi-level recalls.Also use for invoice followup ,Payment Followup, Customer followup for invoice, Send letter for overdue invoice, Send followup email for outstanding payment.

Customer Payment Follow-up Management


Follow-up Levels Configuration

You can configure follow-up levels goto Accounting > Configuration > Follw-up > Follw-up Levels.




Payment Follow-up : Send Letters and Emails

It will send emails and letters according to follow-up levels.


Summary of send letters and emails

After click on send emails and generate letters,It will display summary of emails.


Customer overdue Payment Follow-up

Here you can see the payment follow-up information, You can send overdue emails also print the overdue payment report.
